summary: The other twin, now revisioned to go along with Farkas.
descriptionHtml:
=========================
 ===oooo VILKAS oooo===
=========================

version 1.0
by Avienda

Twin of Farkas, Vilkas is the contentious one. He is always ready for adventure and a fight, never one to back away from a potential slight. His blood runs hot and oftentimes leads him headlong into trouble before he knows it. However, for  his hot headed nature, Vilkas is a scholar, a lover of history, especially when it pertains to the Companions.

He is blunt to the point of rudeness but can be caring when you get to know him. 

------------
Install
------------

To install, just drop the files into your /data folder. I have worked on this so there is no gray coloring to the texture that is known to happen when changing tints or masks on an npc. 

Files included:
	/meshes...
	/textures...
	Vilkas_v1.esp
	readme.txt
	Vilkas-promo.jpg

-----------
Credits
-----------

Better Males Project by Chris57 and FavoredSoul 
   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488

Armor by LordOfWar 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5588
author: Avienda
